title: Chimera
description: What if every single one of your dreams was a prediction of what was to come? What if your dreams had a mind of their own? What if your dreams were subconsciously trying to give you insight of what's to come, and could give you the answers to any unanswered questions that you have been so desperately searching for? Would you be ready to face whatever secrets were uncovered? What if everything you dreamt was okay? What if it wasnâ€™t?
author: C.B.  Blankenship
